## Instructions

This document provides yaml header inforamtion you will need to replicate each week to submit your homework or other blog posts. Please observe the following conventions:

-   Save your own copy of this template as a blog post in the `posts` folder, naming it `FirstLast_hwX.qmd`
-   Edit the yaml header to change your author name - use the same name each week
-   include a *description* that is reader friendly
-   update the *category* list to indicate the type of submission, the data used, the main packages or techniques, your name, or any thing else to make your document easy to find
-   edit as a normal qmd/rmd file



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(dplyr)
library(readxl)

data <- read_csv("Orthodoxy_and_US_leadership_cleaned.csv")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error}
```
Error: 'Orthodoxy_and_US_leadership_cleaned.csv' does not exist in current working directory ('C:/Users/Matt (/Documents/DACSS/603 Summer 2023/603_Summer2023_Sec_1/posts').
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
data$pctox <- data$pctox * 100
```

#Plotting probability and cumulative density functions for variables

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
#Probability distribution of percent Orthodox by country

probability <- data$pctox
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error}
```

```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
barplot(probability, 
        xlab = "Countries by Orthodox Christian Share of Population", 
        col = "steelblue", 
        space = 0, 
        main = "Orthodoxy by Country")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error}
```
Error in barplot(probability, xlab = "Countries by Orthodox Christian Share of Population", : object 'probability' not found
```


#Creatng buckets by which to group data


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# Create a vector to store the oxbucket values
oxbucket <- character(length(data$pctox))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error}
```
Error in data$pctox: object of type 'closure' is not subsettable
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# Assign values to oxbucket based on pctox
oxbucket[data$pctox < 2] <- "<2%"
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error}
```
Error in oxbucket[data$pctox < 2] <- "<2%": object 'oxbucket' not found
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
oxbucket[data$pctox >= 2 & data$pctox < 5] <- "2-5%"
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error}
```
Error in oxbucket[data$pctox >= 2 & data$pctox < 5] <- "2-5%": object 'oxbucket' not found
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
oxbucket[data$pctox >= 5 & data$pctox < 10] <- "5-10%"
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error}
```
Error in oxbucket[data$pctox >= 5 & data$pctox < 10] <- "5-10%": object 'oxbucket' not found
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
oxbucket[data$pctox >= 10 & data$pctox < 25] <- "10-25%"
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error}
```
Error in oxbucket[data$pctox >= 10 & data$pctox < 25] <- "10-25%": object 'oxbucket' not found
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
oxbucket[data$pctox >= 25 & data$pctox < 50] <- "25-50%"
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error}
```
Error in oxbucket[data$pctox >= 25 & data$pctox < 50] <- "25-50%": object 'oxbucket' not found
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
oxbucket[data$pctox >= 50 & data$pctox < 75] <- "50-75%"
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error}
```
Error in oxbucket[data$pctox >= 50 & data$pctox < 75] <- "50-75%": object 'oxbucket' not found
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
oxbucket[data$pctox >= 75 & data$pctox < 100] <- "75-100%"
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error}
```
Error in oxbucket[data$pctox >= 75 & data$pctox < 100] <- "75-100%": object 'oxbucket' not found
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# Add the oxbucket variable to the data frame
data$oxbucket <- oxbucket
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error}
```
Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'oxbucket' not found
```
:::
:::


#Grouping data by variables of interest, obtaining mean and standard deviation

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
avgs <- data %>%
  group_by(bordruua, oxbucket) %>%
  summarize(mean(netapprove),
  sd(netapprove),
  n())
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error}
```
Error in UseMethod("group_by"): no applicable method for 'group_by' applied to an object of class "function"
```
:::
:::

#Splitting variables by category


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
border <- avgs %>% dplyr::filter(bordruua == 1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error}
```
Error in dplyr::filter(., bordruua == 1): object 'avgs' not found
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
noborder <- avgs %>% dplyr::filter(bordruua == 0)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error}
```
Error in dplyr::filter(., bordruua == 0): object 'avgs' not found
```
:::
:::




#Renaming columns

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
colnames(border) <- c("Border_war", "Percent_orthodox", "mean_net_approval", "SD_net_approval", "number")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error}
```
Error in colnames(border) <- c("Border_war", "Percent_orthodox", "mean_net_approval", : object 'border' not found
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
colnames(noborder) <- c("Border_war", "Percent_orthodox", "mean_net_approval", "SD_net_approval", "number")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error}
```
Error in colnames(noborder) <- c("Border_war", "Percent_orthodox", "mean_net_approval", : object 'noborder' not found
```
:::
:::



#Estimating gaps

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
gap <- border$mean_net_approval - noborder$mean_net_approval
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error}
```
Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'border' not found
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
gap_se <- sqrt(border$SD_net_approval^2 / border$number + noborder$SD_net_approval^2 / noborder$number)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error}
```
Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'border' not found
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
gap_ci_l <- gap - 1.96 * gap_se
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error}
```
Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'gap' not found
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
gap_ci_u <- gap + 1.96 * gap_se
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error}
```
Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'gap' not found
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
result <- cbind(border[,-1], noborder[-(1:2)], gap, gap_se, gap_ci_l, gap_ci_u)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error}
```
Error in cbind(border[, -1], noborder[-(1:2)], gap, gap_se, gap_ci_l, : object 'border' not found
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
print(result, digits = 3)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error}
```
Error in print(result, digits = 3): object 'result' not found
```
:::
:::


#Plot


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(data$pctox,
     data$netapprove,
     type = "p",
     main = "Countries: Percent Orthodox Christian vs. Net Approval of US Leadership",
     cex.main = 1,
     xlab = "Percent Orthodox",
     ylab = "Net Approval of US Leadership",
     col = "steelblue",
     pch = 19)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error}
```
Error in data$pctox: object of type 'closure' is not subsettable
```
:::
:::




#Regression

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
model <- lm(data$netapprove ~ data$pctox)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error}
```
Error in data$netapprove: object of type 'closure' is not subsettable
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
plot2 <- plot(data$netapprove ~ data$pctox)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error}
```
Error in data$netapprove: object of type 'closure' is not subsettable
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
#Some fun heteroskedasticity here! (Note how many are bunched at the left)

abline(a = 2.438959, b = -0.1798092)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error}
```
Error in int_abline(a = a, b = b, h = h, v = v, untf = untf, ...): plot.new has not been called yet
```
:::
:::
